sig_info: As blows are exchanged, Star-Lord familiarizes with opponents' techniques, increasing Attack by 1.66 to 4.18 for each hit of the Combo Meter to maximum of 400 hits.
Star-Lord gains 32.65 to 67.05 Block Proficiency for every hit of his opponent's Combo Meter.

ALL ATTACKS: 11% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6.50 seconds, granting +37.35 Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Deals 20% bonus damage when striking a charging enemy.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Star-Lord’s Element Gun selects one element at random each time it fires. Each element has a different effect when it strikes the opponent.
ELEMENT GUN EFFECTS: FIRE: Breaks the opponent's Armor, reducing Armor Rating by 1022.95 for 8 seconds.
AIR: Shocks the opponent, dealing 158.53 Energy Damage over 6 seconds. Shocks ignore Physical Resistance, but not Energy Resistance.
WATER: Drains up to 50% of the opponent’s Max Power.
EARTH: Places a Heal Block on the opponent, stopping all healing effects for 11 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Star-Lord’s Element Gun selects one element at random each time it fires. Each element has a different effect when it strikes the opponent.
